All in one place.

One Show

The South African 4x4 & Outdoor Show

 

held on the

5th and 6th of April 2014

 

at the

Voortrekker Monument

Eeufees Road, Pretoria

 

With Live Entertainment at the event

Monster Truck Show, Monster Truck Rides, Live Bands, Hot Air Balloon, Dirt Bikes and much more.

Come watch the Monster Truck live show from 14:00 -14:30 on each of the show days and the public will also have a chance to drive in the Monster Truck between shows.
